items.sentence: Tom has been spending more and more time in Boston.
Tom's dog attacked the cat that came into our yard.
Tom was walking his dog when he got hit by a truck.
I think that everyone here knows Tom can't do that.
The train stopped suddenly and I spilled my coffee.
It takes a lot of patience to raise a kid like Tom.
I didn't realize Tom didn't live in Boston anymore.
I had some interesting experiences while traveling.
I got up on the wrong side of the bed this morning.
I spent the entire weekend in the library studying.
